title: League of legends uninstalled itself, then had a 10minute suspension AFK QUEUE, wtf?
body: So I started a League game, the loading crashed, tried to restart computer, when I did, the game just fucking uninstalled, lmfao  no jokes, has anyone had this happen? When I log back in, after 5 hours of updating because EVERYTHING was uninstalled, I got a AFK queue ban, now im 10 minutes for 5 fucking games, before I remotely even try to go back in a game, can someone tell me if this will happen again? Like what the hell happened?!

replies.body:
This is a really weird situation that I've never heard of happening before. It's possible that your system disk is encountering issues or the early stages of failure. I strongly recommend [**checking your disk for errors**](https://windowsinstructed.com/run-chkdsk-windows/) before playing further matches.

If you have any questions, be sure to let me know.
